hadiths.text: Rabi' b. S'abra al-jahanni reported on the authority of his father. We went with Allah's Messenger (ï·º) to Mecca during the year of Victory and he narrated like this a hadith transmitted by Bishr (the previous one) but with this addition:" She said: Can it be possible?" And it is also mentioned in it:" He said: The cloak of this (man) is old and worn out
